header.name: More Axolotl Variants
header.description: This Add-on adds 5 new axolotl variants. Made by ftere

subpacks.name:
§c5 Axolotls' colors that you will probably never find in reality!
Variants: Red, Green, Orange, Silver and Black. Modified blue axolotl spawn rate.
§r§4REMEMBER TO SET THE SAME SETTINGS ON THE RESOURCE PACK TOO

§e5 more axolotls variants that you could find in real life!
Variants: Melanoid, Wild Green, Lavander, Mosaic and Enigma. Axolotl spawn rate based on real life.
§r§4REMEMBER TO SET THE SAME SETTINGS ON THE RESOURCE PACK TOO

§aAll the axolotls variants that you can find in the other packs, together!
Variants: Red, Green, Orange, Silver, Black, Melanoid, Wild Green, Lavander, Mosaic and Enigma. Axolotl spawn rate mixed.
§r§4REMEMBER TO SET THE SAME SETTINGS ON THE RESOURCE PACK TOO
